title: BelowDeckSailing: There Will Be Bronzer
description:
Wow. This week's episode of Below Deck: Sailing Yacht gave us some of the worst guests in franchise history, the worst tip in franchise history, the worst head in jury in franchise history, and the worst bronzer mishap in franchise history. Plus, Gary and Daisy locked lips like two sea anemones stuck on each other. What a night to be alive.

Be sure to watch this recap with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/63843306

Get tix to our live shows: https://www.watchwhatcrappens.com/10th-anniversary-hunky-dory-tour/
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
